items.title: 7-Zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: This release includes various stability improvements and updates to enhance compatibility across platforms. Recommended for all users.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.24 published on 2025-02-23. The summary of changes are: Added 'condition' to LakeFormation OptIn APIs, introduced WithPrivilegedAccess flag, and fixed an integer parsing bug in response body.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.70.0 published on 2024-03-04. The summary of changes are: Includes fixes for CVE-2024-50602 and CVE-2024-12797, and introduces a breaking change where '--password' no longer accepts a service principal certificate; use '--certificate' instead.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: This release addresses language server crashes and deployment failures related to looped resources. It also introduces the Deployment Pane as a non-experimental feature and offers code fixes for qualifying shadowed decorator functions.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version v1.39.1 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: This release optimizes worker thread reuse for file parsing, updates feature request and bug report templates, and improves stability with various fixes and enhancements.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version v1.7.12 published on 2023-03-06. The summary of changes are: Fixed issues with io.popenyield() return values and resolved crashes caused by cd commands exceeding MAX_PATH length.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 25.0.0 published on 2025-03-02. The summary of changes are: The latest version features milestone updates, offering enhanced stability and performance improvements for a seamless database management experience. It is free, open-source, and also available via GitHub.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: This release adds Docker layer vulnerability scanning and provides compatibility with Docker 25+, alongside bug fixes and improvements such as updated Go dependencies and installation instructions for Snap.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.39.0 published on 2025-03-05. The summary of changes are: Introduces Docker Desktop CLI and support for the --platform flag on docker load and save commands, alongside updates to Docker Compose, Buildx, and Kubernetes. Includes several security fixes and performance enhancements.

items.title: Buiild Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 6.0.428 published on 2024-11-12. The summary of changes are: This is the latest stable release of the .NET SDK 6.0, which includes necessary tools to build and run .NET applications. It integrates various runtimes and supports multiple platforms. Users are encouraged to upgrade for the most recent features and fixes.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 8.0.407 published on 2025-03-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes crucial security fixes ensuring a secure development environment. Developers are encouraged to upgrade to benefit from the latest improvements.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.16 published on 2025-02-24. The summary of changes are: This release updates draw.io core to version 26.0.16 and uses Electron 34.2.0. It includes all changes from previous versions up to 26.0.16.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Improved handling of pktmon captures for better user experience.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1.1 published on 2025-03-03. The summary of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1.1 'PÃ©ter' is the latest stable release, containing new updates from the 7.1 release branch and improvements across multiple libraries. This release ensures better multimedia compatibility and functionality.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The Gateway 2024.3.3 is released with minor updates.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version v2.48.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This version addresses the phasing out of git svn support, discontinues the 32-bit installer, and introduces enhancements like Git v2.48.0 improvements and bug fixes.

items.title: cli
items.content_html: Version v1.53.0 published on 2025-02-14T15:20:04Z. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates to document the GLAB_CHECK_UPDATE environment variable, new command implementations like glab ci cancel, and fixes for several issues such as artifact sub-directory creation and project snippets without a repository.

items.title: gitlab release cli
items.content_html: Version v0.22.0 published on 2025-02-17. The summary of changes are: Release CLI v0.22.0 includes updates from merging 'release-0-22-0' branch into 'master' and other enhancements.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version v17.9.1 published on 2025-03-08T02:20:03Z. The summary of changes are: Reverted changes made to the changelog for version 17.9.0, addressing errors introduced in the prior release.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.1 published on 2023-10-01. The summary of changes are: This release includes patches and updates improving stability and compatibility across platforms.

items.title: golang1.21
items.content_html: Version 1.21.13 published on 2024-08-06. The summary of changes are: Includes bug fixes to the go command, the covdata command, and the bytes package, enhancing stability and performance.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package, along with bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version 1.23.7 published on 2025-03-04. The summary of changes are: The latest revision includes security fixes for the net/http package, along with bug fixes to cgo, the compiler, and the reflect, runtime, and syscall packages.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.2 published on 2025-03-13. The summary of changes are: Helm v3.17.2 is a patch release that enhances user experience and encourages upgrades. This release includes debugging and chart contribution improvements, along with community engagement initiatives.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13. The summary of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces exciting new features like modular grids, improved palette file handling, and customizable handles alongside faster extensions and extensive bug fixes. This release enhances user experience through tools like the Shape Builder for image clipping and better import support for Affinity Designer files. Additionally, a refreshed icon set provides a modern look, with over 500 new designs in the Dash theme.

items.title: IntelliJ IDEA
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.4.1 published on 2025-03-05. The summary of changes are: This update fixes import order formatting settings to properly preserve user-defined preferences. Refer to the release notes for detailed changes.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: This release includes performance improvements and critical bug fixes for enhanced stability and usability.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: This release addresses security vulnerabilities, enhances CLI usability, and includes optimizations for jq's language and core features. Fixes include buffer overflow issues, memory leaks, and improved compatibility with JSON specifications. Additional changes optimize background colors, string handling, and several other functionalities.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes patch updates and stability improvements as part of the 1.32.x series. It brings bug fixes and minor adjustments to enhance Kubernetes functionality.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: The latest stable version enhances build process automation and supports dependency management for non-source files. It introduces efficient updates by recompiling only necessary files. Additionally, it provides flexibility in managing various tasks through makefiles.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-03-12. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 introduces the latest features and bug fixes, making it the recommended version for all users. It requires JDK 8 or above and remains compatible with older JDK versions through toolchains.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 25.1.1-2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Bug fixes and update to conda-anaconda-tos version 0.1.2. Includes compatibility with Python versions 3.12.9, 3.11.11, 3.10.16, and 3.9.21.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version 20.19.0 published on 2025-03-13. The summary of changes are: The latest Node.js release provides stability and enhancements, ensuring improved performance and developer productivity.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version v16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: Node.js v16.20.2 (Gallium) is the latest stable release under Active LTS, featuring critical security updates and supported enhancements for production use.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version 18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: Hydrogen LTS release with updated npm to v10.8.2, ensuring long-term support and critical bug fixes for production use.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.19.0 published on 2025-03-13. The summary of changes are: The latest stable Node.js version includes updates to performance and reliability enhancements, ensuring compatibility with npm v10.8.2 and other tools.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version v22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Brings improvements and bug fixes, enhancing overall stability and support for npm v10.9.2.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version 8.7.8 published on 2025-03-07. The summary of changes are: Version 8.7.8 includes fixes for three regressions and underscores Notepad++'s support for Ukraine.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes updated client tooling archives, preconfigured installation support for this version, and important upgrade notes for clusters migrating from version 4.15. Artifacts for this release are sourced from the okd-scos repository.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 11.0.26 includes IANA time zone data 2024b with historical updates for Mexico, Mongolia, and Portugal. It enhances debugging with thread and timestamp support and addresses notable security vulnerabilities along with several critical bug fixes.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: Java SE 17.0.14 includes IANA time zone data version 2024b, updates security baselines, and resolves various issues including bug fixes for client-libs, core-libs, and hotspot. It also enhances the handling of string concatenation and process arguments.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 21.0.6 includes IANA time zone data 2024b, addressing historical data improvements for Mexico, Mongolia, and Portugal, alongside compliance with POSIX.1-2024. It fixes several security vulnerabilities and enhances system stability while also updating ProcessBuilder behavior on Windows.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on 2019-03-04. The summary of changes are: JDK 8u441 includes general availability release updates, performance enhancements for enterprise users, and bundled patch releases with critical fixes for customers.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2023-01-23. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates to the .NET SDK, build improvements, and enhancements to the deployment pipeline. Key fixes include optimized release content generation and updated help documentation for version 7.5.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: This release includes stability improvements and updates across various PuTTY utilities. It is recommended for users seeking a reliable and stable version of the software. Experimental features like Windows pterm may not be included.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest bug fixes and optimizations, improving overall stability. It is the latest stable version available for production use. Compatible with multiple platforms including Windows, macOS, and Linux.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: Python 3.10.16 includes important security fixes and optimizations to ensure stability during the security maintenance phase. This release marks continued support aligned with Python's release cycle.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release focuses on security fixes and stability improvements for Python 3.11, ensuring better application safety and performance.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest bug fixes and optimizations for Python 3.12. It enhances performance and resolves known issues from previous versions.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest security updates and minor bug fixes, ensuring stability and reliability for Python 3.9 users.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.6 published on 2025-02-28. The summary of changes are: Rider 2024.3.6 includes fixes for debugging session start issues, macOS freezes tied to Metal rendering, duplicate Go to Symbol search results, xUnit v3 test execution errors, and Qodana hanging on Unreal Engine project analysis.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.41.1 published on 2024-09-08. The summary of changes are: Updated Chinese, Turkish, Arabic, and Dutch localizations. Fixed issues with Move Left/Right commands and extra color button. Minor typo corrections included.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.42.1 published on 2025-03-10. The summary of changes are: Fixed a bug where some special variables caused a type error when used in global variables.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version 1.11.2 published on 2025-03-12. The summary of changes are: This update includes enhancements for Azure Backend OIDC token refresh and several bug fixes, such as error handling for template strings with null values and improved backend behavior for Azure configurations.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.98.2 published on 2025-03-13. The summary of changes are: This February 2025 Recovery update addresses specific issues. For comprehensive details, refer to the release notes on Updates on code.visualstudio.com.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes a rewritten console hosting implementation, support for Sixels, Grapheme Clusters, and a new UI for CMD and Python pop-ups. It improves performance while introducing some compatibility changes, ensuring future readiness for ConPTY.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes addressing menu behavior issues, improved folder and plugin comparison functionality, and updates to translations in multiple languages for enhanced user experience.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.5 published on not provided. The summary of changes are: The current stable release of Wireshark, version 4.4.5, supersedes all previous versions with the latest features and updates.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version v4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: Create parent directories when --split-exp is used. Bumped dependencies. Thanks to contributor @rudo-thomas.
